user_instruction: 'Reply to an immigrant community member, Maria'"'"'s latest inquiry about credit building for immigrants (maria@newhorizons.org). You can check out my past emails for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Updated Guidance on Credit-Building Resources for Immigrants

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. Maria from the New Horizons Immigrant Support Center just emailed me with a follow-up question about the best current strategies and resources for immigrants looking to build or strengthen their credit in the U.S.

Could you please take a moment to review our earlier correspondence (see past email thread titled “Credit-Building Toolkit for Newcomers”) and share:

• Any recent changes to secured-card or credit-builder loan options you recommend  
• Updated tips on establishing payment history without a SSN (e.g., ITIN-based products, rent/utility reporting services)  
• Pitfalls or predatory offers newcomers should avoid in the current market  
• Any new multilingual or community-based financial-education materials we can pass along

Maria trusts your expertise, so your timely insights would be invaluable for my reply to her.

Whenever you have a chance today or tomorrow, could you drop me a quick summary or point me to any updated docs in Notion or on the shared drive?

Thanks a ton, John!

Best,  
[Your Name]

final_output:
